channel.title: Comments on: Selar.co Review – Everything You Need to Know Before Selling on Selar
channel.description: Web Ã— Design; Branditechture is an hybrid creative design agency.

item.title: By: Yusuf Odukoya
item.dc:creator: Yusuf Odukoya
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://branditechture.agency/selar-co-review-everything-you-need-to-know-before-selling-on-selar/#comment-1354">Daniel</a>.
1. Yes, you can safely customize your Selar links with a URL shortnening service like Bitly (bit.ly). 2. It would be yourdomain(dot)com/wordpress for sure.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Daniel.

1. Yes, you can safely customize your Selar links with a URL shortnening service like Bitly (bit.ly).
2. It would be yourdomain(dot)com/wordpress for sure.

item.title: By: Daniel
item.dc:creator: Daniel
item.description: Hi, when you customise a product URL, can you further customise it with bit.ly? Will it still be valid after bit.ly customisation....also, if you integrate your own domain, will your custom product URLs still be https://selar.co/wordpress or it will be https://your/ preferred name/wordpress
item.content:encoded: Hi, when you customise a product URL, can you further customise it with bit.ly? Will it still be valid after bit.ly customisation….also, if you integrate your own domain, will your custom product URLs still be https://selar.co/wordpress or it will be https://your/ preferred name/wordpress

item.title: By: Victor
item.dc:creator: Victor
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://branditechture.agency/selar-co-review-everything-you-need-to-know-before-selling-on-selar/#comment-502">Bkesi</a>.
If you didn't set payout as automated, then you have to do it manually.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Bkesi.

If you didn’t set payout as automated, then you have to do it manually.

item.title: By: Dorcas
item.dc:creator: Dorcas
item.description: Hi, my name is Dorcas, I would love to explore selar but have no products to sell. I thought I should go digital. Please could I help sell your ebooks and courses to start with? Thanks
item.content:encoded:
Hi, my name is Dorcas, I would love to explore selar but have no products to sell. I thought I should go digital. Please could I help sell your ebooks and courses to start with?
Thanks

item.title: By: Victor
item.dc:creator: Victor
item.description: This is quite informative. Thank you. <strong>Question:</strong> How does Selar make money from my sale, do I get charged per sale or they get commission from each sale?
item.content:encoded:
This is quite informative. Thank you.
Question: How does Selar make money from my sale, do I get charged per sale or they get commission from each sale?
